summary: Realistic Eyes is a eye texture replacer for all races. The textures have a resolution of 1024x1024.
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=LightSlateGrey][SIZE=+3][B]About Realistic Eyes 2.0:[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]

Realistic Eyes is a eye texture replacer for all races. The textures have a resolution of 1024x1024. I tried to keep vanilla colors, unless I could not see a clear difference between them.
Please read the instructions. Everything should work fine then.

[COLOR=green]If you like this mod please don\'t forget to endorse it. If you don\'t like it, don\'t use it. No need for bitchy comments. Constructive criticism ist welcome, though. Just stay polite ;)
Please don\'t forget: Comments and endorsements encourage modders to continue their work.

I\'m not a native speaker, but I\'ll try to help you, if I can. I can\'t answer private messages, as I\'m not registered in Nexus Forums and therefore can\'t open them. I don\'t have much time for modding, so I can\'t take requests :( There will be more stuff, when I upload some :) Please be patient.

If something isn\'t working, please just tell me and I\'ll try to fix it. Thank you :)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue][SIZE=+2]Full:[/SIZE][/COLOR]

All textures in one package. No AddOn files included.
If there\'s an update, you don\'t need to download the whole package again. Just download \"RE 2 - Update\" and merge/replace.

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue][B]Humans & Elves[/B][/COLOR]
I used a real iris for the texture and added Mr. Dave\'s \"Lashmaker Eyelash Alpha Resource\" lashes.
Elven and human pupils got the same texture, alpha and size and I also made elven eyeballs white (found them ugly), so that it\'ll look good, if elves and humans share eye textures.

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue][B]Orcs[/B][/COLOR]
I used the texture for elves and humans and made the irises a bit smaller, because I wanted to see more of the eyeball. The eyeballs remain dark.

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue][B]Khajiit[/B][/COLOR]
I used lion eyes for reference and picked pet cat eye colors, like siam (blue), russian blue (green) etc.
Instead of slit versions there are more color variations.

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue][B]Argonians (WIP)[/B][/COLOR]
This reptilian beastrace reminds me on raptors. Because of that I choose to give them crocodile-like eyes instead of a mix of gecko and crocodile.
I also didn\'t like the difference between male (crocodile) and female irises (gecko). So I also created three different texture packages and a esp file.

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue][SIZE=+2]RE 2 AddOns[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[B]\"RE 2 AddOn - Elves and Humans\":[/B]
- enables \"eye sharing\" for humans and elves
- enables Karliahs eyes for humans and elves male and female
- forces wood elves and dark elves to use the blind and vampire textures of humans
[B]\"RE 2 AddOn - Elves and Humans Dawnguard\":[/B]
- same as \"RE 2 AddOn - Elves and Humans\", but compatible with Dawnguard.

[COLOR=Red]Use either \"RE 2 AddOn - Elves and Humans\" OR \"RE 2 AddOn - Elves and Humans Dawnguard\", not both![/COLOR]

[B]\"RE 2 AddOn - Argonian FBG\":[/B]
- Female gecko pupils for male argonians
[B]\"RE 2 AddOn - Argonian MBG\":[/B]
- Male crocodile pupils for female argonians

[COLOR=#FF0000]Use only one of those two packages, as both genders are included :)[/COLOR]

[B]\"RE 2 AddOn - Argonian Mix\":[/B]
- this esp unlocks all argonian eye textures for both genders

[B]\"RE 2 AddOn - Orc Vampires\":[/B]
- adds a custom Vampire eye texture for orcs (esp and texture included)
This doesn\'t work with Dawnguard. I really tried everything, to make a working Version.


If you want to use my vampire eye textures, please keep in mind, that
- elven races, humans and orcs share eyevampire_01.dds (and eyevampire_02.dds)
- khajiit use eyekhajiitvampire.dds
- argonians use eyeargonianvampirefemale.dds and eyeargonianvampiremale.dds
in the vanilla version of the game.

If you want to use my blind eye textures, please keep in mind, that
- humans and high elves share eyeblind.dds
- wood elves and dark elves use eyeorcblind.dds
- orcs use eyeorcblind.dds
- khajiit and argonians share eyeargonianblindmale.dds
in the vanilla version of the game.

[COLOR=LightSlateGrey][SIZE=+3][B]Last Update:[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue]20. April 2013:[/COLOR]
- \"RE 2 - Full\" & \"RE 2 - Update\"
Updated/New Textures.
Eye muscles of elves, humans and orcs are a bit darker now.
Argonian eyes are finally included. I\'ve made some minor improvements to the RE 1.0 version. Nothing fancy.
Please remember: You don\'t need to download \"RE 2 - Full\" to add the new/updated textures. Just download \"RE 2 - Update\" and merge.
- New: \"RE 2 AddOn - Argonian FBG\"
- New: \"RE 2 AddOn - Argonian MBG\"

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue]08. April 2013:[/COLOR]
I deleted most of the single packages, as I\'m too lazy and too busy to keep them organized.
- \"RE 2 - Full\"
New textures for humans, elves and orcs. I changed the colors a bit. Let\'s hope the annoying \"glow-effect\" is finally gone.
As promised I deleted the eye muscles of vampire eyes. I did the same for demon eyes (pitch black ones), too.
I also changed the lashes. I\'m now using Mr. Dave\'s \"Lashmaker Eyelash Alpha Resource\". This should look much better now.

- \"RE 2 AddOn - Orc Vampires\"
New texture with the new lashes.

Please test the new textures and post screenshots. I\'d like to know if the textures are really better now :)
Also, please keep in mind, that different lighting mods produce different looks for textures. Lighting of interiors also differs greatly from outdoor lighting. I\'m using \"Climates of Tamriel\", \"Realistic Lighting Overhaul\" and \"Enhanced Lights and FX\".

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue]05. March 2013:[/COLOR]
- \"RE 2 - Full\" & \"RE 2 Misc - Effects\"
I lowered the brightness of eyebrown_sk.dds. The colors are vivid, but the irises don\'t \"glow\" anymore (see screenshot).

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue]28. February 2013:[/COLOR]
- \"RE 2 AddOn - Elves and Humans\" & \"RE 2 AddOn - Elves and Humans Dawnguard\":
Similar bug like last time, but this one was made by Bethesda, as I didn\'t change orc eyes.
One eye setting for orcs used human blind textures. I fixed that.

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue]18. February 2013:[/COLOR]
- \"RE 2 AddOn - Elves and Humans Dawnguard\":
One eye setting for wood elves used orc blind textures. I fixed that.

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue]5. November 2012:[/COLOR]
- \"RE 2 - Khajiit\" uploaded
- \"RE 2 - Full\" updated: Khajiit textures
- \"RE 2 Misc - Vampire Eyes\": Khajiit texture

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue]27. October 2012:[/COLOR]
- Renamed folders. This should avoid \"dozens\" of entrys in NMM and Mod Organizer in the future.
- Uploaded \"RE 2 - Full\". This includes all textures, but no esp files.

[COLOR=LightSteelBlue]26 October 2012:[/COLOR]
- Seperated RE 1.0 from RE 2.0. Too many archives and more to come. Confusing for you and very annoing for me.

[COLOR=LightSlateGrey][SIZE=+3][B]Distribution Permission:[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]

You may NOT redistribute this mod in any way or claim it as your own.
If you want to use this textures in a compilation, please ask first.

[COLOR=LightSlateGrey][SIZE=+3][B]Credits:[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
